short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Toggle the visibility of the YouTube bottom control bar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: YouTube Bottom Bar Toggle is a simple and effective Chrome extension designed to enhance your YouTube viewing experience. This extension allows you to easily toggle the visibility of YouTube's bottom control bar, providing a cleaner and more focused viewing experience.
